name: Scary Boss 3D
description:
Recently your are hired in an organization. You have heard much about the Boss of your new office that he is the worst Boss Ever. But its time to teach him a lesson. Your objective is to do every thing against office laws and tease your Boss.

Its your 1st day at office. Find your cabin. Get files from your desk and submit them to your Boss Office. In the end the Boss will yell upon you and here you will decide to make his life a hell.

Boss is out for a while. Go to his office and paint mustaches on his portrait right behind his chair. Do this before he comes back. Flirt with boss assistant before he comes back. Get a flower from sider table and give it to her. Ask her for date. Make a print out of boss picture and write I AM CRAZY on it. Put it on Office Walls while you avoid getting caught.
Loose Boss Chair nuts and make him fall when he will sit on it. You need to attach a paper patch on Boss back. He is coming in conference room. Get paper from printer and place it on his chair. It must say KICK ME. Be careful he does not notice you.

Scary Boss 3D is one of fun filled games of 2017. You’ll definitely love its amazing missions. Teasing your angry boss and making him crazing is an amazing feeling ever.

Let’s Download and have fun!!!

Features:
• Interesting activities!
• Direction map and Hints!
• Addictive Gameplay
• Different Mysteries to solve!
• High Quality 3D Graphics!
• Amazing Sounds!
• Smooth and Easy Controls!
